name: t2g_kurs_check
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool words_world.
Tool description: Quote from world people
API description: Checks the exchange rate of IDR to another currency on a given date.

date.description: The date for which to check the exchange rate, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

valuta.description: The currency to which IDR exchange rate is checked.
